name: Tablerender
tagline: A jquery plugin to render table or grid views as server side guys call it with sorting, pagination and theming.
body:
### Table Render Plugin. The plugin automates the creation of tables with data. It provides options for paging , templating headers, templating fields, creating amalgamated columns and lots more. ### Usage ###### Include jquery.js, tablerender.js and tablerender.css references on your page ``` ``` ###### Set up a target container where the plugin needs to render the data ```
``` ### Authors and Contributors Vivek Siruvuri (@svivekvarma)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
